title: Fragments, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen, metallic thread
Technique: needle lace, interlacing technique
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Two rectangular fragments in linen and gold and pointed at either end. Pattern is geometric and encloses a centered double-tailed mermaid.

tombstone.epitaph:

late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: linen, metallic thread
